ip: String: Recommended: The device IP address, in either IPv4 or IPv6 format.
mac: String: Optional: The Media Access Control (MAC) address of the endpoint.
name: String: Optional: The alternate device name, ordinarily as assigned by an administrator.
type: String: Optional: The device type. For example: unknown, server, desktop, laptop, tablet, mobile, virtual, browser, or other
type_id: Integer: Required: The device type ID. 0: Unknown, 1: Server, 2: Desktop, 3: Laptop, 4: Tablet, 5: Mobile, 6: Virtual, 7: IOT, 8: Browser, 9: Firewall, 10: Switch, 11: Hub, 12: Router, 13: IDS, 14: IPS, 15: Load Balancer, 99: Other
uid: String: Recommended: The unique identifier of the device. For example the Windows TargetSID or AWS EC2 ARN.
risk_level: String: Optional: The risk level, normalized to the caption of the risk_level_id value.
risk_level_id: Integer: Recommended: The normalized risk level id. 0: Info, 1: Low, 2: Medium, 3: High, 4: Critical, 99: Other
risk_score: String: Recommended: The risk score as reported by the event source.
agent_list: Array: Optional: A list of agent objects associated with a device, endpoint, or resource.
autoscale_uid: String: Optional: The unique identifier of the cloud autoscale configuration.
boot_time: String: Optional: Timestamp of The time the system was booted.
created_time: String: Optional: Timestamp of The time when the device was known to have been created.
desc: String: Optional: The description of the device, ordinarily as reported by the operating system.
domain: String: Optional: The network domain where the device resides. For example: work.example.com.
eid: String: Optional: An Embedded Identity Document, is a unique serial number that identifies an eSIM-enabled device.
first_seen_time: String: Optional: The initial discovery time of the device.
hypervisor: String: Optional: The name of the hypervisor running on the device. For example, Xen, VMware, Hyper-V, VirtualBox, etc.
iccid: String: Optional: The Integrated Circuit Card Identification of a mobile device. Typically it is a unique 18 to 22 digit number that identifies a SIM card.
imei: String: Optional: The International Mobile Equipment Identity that is associated with the device.
instance_uid: String: Recommended: The unique identifier of a VM instance.
interface_name: String: Recommended: The name of the network interface (e.g. eth2).
interface_uid: String: Recommended: The unique identifier of the network interface.
last_seen_time: String: Recommended: The most recent discovery time of the device.
model: String: Optional: The model of the device. For example ThinkPad X1 Carbon.
modified_time: String: Optional: Timestamp of The time when the device was last known to have been modified.
os_machine_uuid: String: Optional: UUID of The operating system assigned Machine ID.
region: String: Optional: The region where the virtual machine is located. For example, an AWS Region.
